    Things I Love

Barrel Monster

Shortened:

http://jpcody.in/2b

Dated:

14 June 2009

I've got a minor fascination with street art and the subversive in general. It's for that reason that I was struck by this barrel monster created by an NC State University student. It's a bummer that he was arrested, but I imagine street art wouldn't be nearly as fun if it were legalized.

Around here, you can visit the colophon, blog, portfolio, or things I love.
Elsewhere, you can find me on Twitter, Flickr, Pinboard, or Church Marketing Sucks.
